verses.name: Genesis 21:10
verses.text: Wherefore she said unto Abraham, Cast out this bondwoman and her son: for the son of this bondwoman shall not be heir with my son, even with Isaac.

verses.name: Genesis 21:11
verses.text: And the thing was very grievous in Abraham’s sight because of his son.

verses.name: Genesis 21:12
verses.text: And God said unto Abraham, Let it not be grievous in thy sight because of the lad, and because of thy bondwoman; in all that Sarah hath said unto thee, hearken unto her voice; for in Isaac shall thy seed be called.
